title: Remove AskUserQuestion confirmation gates from subagent workflows
description: Subagents currently have instructions to use AskUserQuestion tool to confirm their plan before execution. Remove these confirmation requirements to allow subagents to execute autonomously without user approval gates.

title: Skill-based architecture with persistent memory management
description: Convert agent-based workflows to Claude Code skills to maintain context across interactions. Implement memory-first approach where research subagents record insights in memento and return summaries, while main conversation uses memento proactively without context pollution.

title: Create memory-search skill for querying memento graph
description: Create a Claude Code skill that searches memento memories and traverses the knowledge graph. Returns processed relevant memories to main conversation without re-recording. Can update graph with new semantic connections between previously disconnected memories.

title: Convert research/exploration agents to skills with memento recording
description: Convert agents that do research and exploration (codebase-explorer, research-specialist, etc.) to Claude Code skills. These skills should record insights in memento and return only relevant summaries to main conversation to avoid context pollution.

title: Update main conversation agent to proactively use memento
description: Modify main conversation agent instructions to proactively query and record memories in memento throughout work sessions. Should leverage memory-search skill for retrieving relevant context.

title: Convert workflow agents to skills (requirements, story-planner, etc.)
description: Convert workflow-specific agents (requirements-analyst, story-planner, adr-writer, etc.) to Claude Code skills to maintain context across interactions and prevent amnesia between invocations.

title: Define skill vs subagent decision criteria
description: Document clear criteria for when to use skills (context preservation needed) vs subagents (research/exploration that generates noise). Update architecture documentation with decision tree.
